config.//: Modify this array to specify what to include in the generated tar.gz file

scripts.package: npm run build && tar cvf ${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.tar.gz --transform "s,^,${npm_package_name}/," `npm run --silent get-bundle`
scripts.get-bundle: node -e "var fs = require('fs'); var config = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('./package.json')); console.log(config.config.bundle.join(' '));"
